example.name: autogen1
example.text: TransAtlantic , whose Transol Investments Ltd. unit owns the largest minority stake in Sun Life , has agreed not to make a takeover bid for the British life insurer without the prior consent of the French company , known as UAP .
example.arg: TransAtlantic , whose Transol Investments Ltd. unit owns the largest minority stake in Sun Life , ---> *-2
make a takeover bid for the British life insurer
of the French company , known as UAP
